snippet.title: Sonic The Fighters (XBLA) - Xbox 360 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Captured off the Xbox One. 

This port of SEGA's often-forgotten arcade game Sonic The Fighters was released for the Xbox 360 via Xbox Live Arcade. This 360 release includes online multiplayer, achievements (200G) and save states. And of course, it's backward compatible on the Xbox One and Series X|S.

Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic The Fighters (C) SEGA
Also released for PlayStation 3 (PSN)

#sonic #xbla #xboxlivearcade #xbox360 #retrogames #retrogaming #sega #xboxgaming #xbox360games #xbox360gameplay #backwardcompatibility #xboxone #xbox #xboxseriess #xboxseriesx #theforeseenarcade #sonicthehedgehog #sonicthefighters

FUN FACT: The XBLA / PSN version is the only version that lets you play as Honey The Cat, who was a scrapped character in the original and the Sonic Gems Collections release.
